title: Combining intentions in fasting
transcript: the first question is for Manila and she says that she has a number of days missed in Ramadan and now we are approaching as you all know the sacred months of the Shuja and we know that the first nine days the good deeds are the best in them and it is recommended to fast them so it is permissible for me to join the intentions and make up for the mistakes of Ramadan in these nine days of the agenda answer is yes you may make up for your mistakes rubberband while fasting the nine days of the hedges so you would hit two birds with one stone
